paper_abstract: In this paper, we study numerical approximation for a reaction-diffusion system with coupled singular absorption terms and positive Dirichlet boundary conditions. Our purpose is to find a criterion to identify the simultaneous and non-simultaneous quenching which coincides with the continuous one. We also show that the quenching set and quenching rate converge to the continuous one.
paper_title: Numerical quenching for a reaction-diffusion system with coupled singular absorption terms
